page.title: 14A Dunnington Boy
page.content: I get up at 08.00. Breakfast is ready. I eat cornflakes and drink orange squash. I put on my coat and shoes, get my bag,say goodbye to Mum and walk to school. I meet my friends in the playground.The bell goes, we all rush in noisily.I go to the classroom, get my school work out.Mrs Copley counts the names of people staying for a cooked dinner. I take it to the school secretary. Then we may line up for an assembly or may get on with our work.At 10.30 the bell goes for break. I play football for 20 mins.Then we go in for maths. Soon it is over. I eat a cooked meal in the school hall, self- service, then I go to play.At 13.05 it is time for science. We look for mini beasts. It is time for games. We are playing football. Then it is home time. I walk home, watch T.V. for hours and go to bed.
